memberdef.name: testConfigs
memberdef.initializer:
{ {"0_1", "0 to 1", {0.f, 1.f}}, {"-1_1", "-1 to 1", {-1.f, 1.f}}, {"-8_1", "-8 to 1", {-8.f, 1.f}}, {"0_8", "0 to 8", {0.f, 8.f}}, {"-NaNq_NaNq", "-NaN to +NaN (quiet)", {f(negNanQ), f(posNanQ)}},
{"-NaNs_NaNs", "-NaN to +NaN (signalling)", {f(negNanS), f(posNanS)}}, {"-INF_INF", "-INF to +INF", {f(negInf), f(posInf)}}, {"-Max_Max", "-Max (normal) to +Max (normal)", {f(negMax), f(posMax)}}, {"-MinN_MinN", "-Min (normal) to +Min (normal)", {f(negMinNorm), f(posMinNorm)}}, {"-MaxSN_MaxSN", "-Max (subnormal) to +Max (subnormal)", {f(negMaxSubNorm), f(posMaxSubNorm)}}, {"-Min_Min", "-Min (subnormal) to +Min (subnormal)", {f(negMinSubNorm), f(posMinSubNorm)}}, }

memberdef.argsstring: (float x, float y, float width, float height, float from, float to, std::vector< float > &vb)
memberdef.name: CreateGeometry
